currentPositions.description: The Director of Clinical Research will provide oversight, leadership, and guidance in the management and execution of clinical research at Optimum Clinical Research Group and Southwest Women’s Oncology Inc. The Director will work collaboratively with the executive team to oversee start-up of a new research program. He/She will establish research priorities, operational structure, assess organizational processes and create a research program that influences future health practice through integration of research with clinical care.  The Director’s portfolio includes overseeing research in the performance of oncology clinical trials, establishing a tumor biobank, precision medicine / diagnostics trials, cancer control and prevention research, health outcomes & integrative therapies research, women’s health research, community outreach, and working to establish funding strategies for research in regenerative medicine, exercise & environmental medicine, and hyperbarics with the Optimum Human Performance Center. The Director is a leader, team player, problem solver, lifelong learner, and a self-starter. They maintain excellent rapport with all OCRG, SWWO, and Optimum Staff. They will enable and facilitate research while providing the infrastructure to ensure the research is conducted in accordance with all governing laws and regulations.
currentPositions.title: Executive Director, Clinical Research
